generalItems.item: Change where I keep my car
Change where I keep my car
Your car address is one of the factors which can affect your premium. If there is a change to your premium it will be shown at the next step.
There was no change to your premium.

Thank you

You've successfully renewed your policy.

Thank you

You have successfully updated your policy with your new car information.

If this change also applies to your roadside assistance, please call us on 13 17 03.

Thank you

You have successfully updated the address where you keep your car.

Other policies?

If you have any other car insurance policies please change your address on each individual policy. For home insurance policies please call us on 1300 657 627 to update your address.

Mailing address

Do you need to update your policy mailing address with this new address? Please edit your mailing address in My details.

The mailing address for this policy can only be updated by {0}. To update the mailing address on this policy, please ask this policyholder either to login and update their details or give us a call on 1300 657 627.
Do you need to update your mailing address with your new address? Please edit your mailing address in ‘My details’.
Are you sure you want to cancel? The changes you have made will not be saved.
Are you sure you want to close?
Your total annual premium for your next period of insurance is shown above.
Adjustment premium

item.helpText: Your car address is one of the factors that can affect your premium. You may be required to pay an additional premium or we may need to refund you part of your premium in order to make this change effective. The adjustment premium is the change of premium that applies to your new car address.

generalItems.item: You have recently made changes to this policy which are displayed below. These changes start from {0}. If you require further changes to your policy before this date please call 1300 657 627.
Your policy has a payment pending which means you are unable to edit your policy until the payment has been processed. This can take up to 5 working days.
Your policy has a rejected payment which needs to be actioned before you can edit your policy. Please call us on 1300 657 627 to arrange payment.
This is an inactive policy. Please ignore this policy and refer to your replacement policy.
Please check your Policy Schedule for future instalment amounts as they may differ.
We have paid your remaining instalment(s) and you will receive a refund of {0}.
You will need to make a one off payment to cover your adjustment premium.
You will need to make a one off payment to cover the change to your premium. The payment will be debited on the next business day.
You will receive a one off refund as a result of the change to your policy.
This amount will be adjusted across your remaining instalments.
What would you like to do with your policy?
Here you can view your claims in progress and access claims help and information.
By clicking the "Pay Now" button you will be transferred to a secure payment gateway to complete your payment.

Important: Check account details

Please check the account details you have entered. It is your responsibility to ensure the details, including Account number, BSB and Account name have been entered correctly. Entering incorrect details may mean the wrong account is credited and it may not be possible to recover the funds. To the extent permitted by law, RAC Insurance is not liable for loss arising from any error in instructions given by you.

An amount of {0} will be refunded to you.
Please enter the details for the account you would like credited with the refund amount.

Your policy is currently in renewal which means any changes you make to your policy will only be effective from your renewal date. Your renewal date is shown in the start date field below. If you need to make a change before this date please call us on 1300 657 627.

Excesses

The total of your basic excess is specified above. Please note that other additional excesses may apply, including:

Earthquake excess $500
Flood excess $200
Malicious damage/theft excess (applies to landlord's policies only) $300
Personal valuables excess $100

We will tell you if any other excess applies based on your individual risk details and claims experience.

Upon issuing of a policy, the applicable excesses will be shown on your policy documents.

Excesses

The total of your basic excess and voluntary excess is specified above. Please note other additional excesses may apply, including:

Age excess
A driver under 19 years of age $650
A driver aged 19 to 20 years $550
A driver aged 21 to 23 years $450
A driver aged 24 to 25 years $300
Inexperienced driver excess $300
Windscreen and window glass replacement excess ($0 if removed) $100

Imposed excess, based on your individual risk details and claims experience.

The applicable imposed excesses or any excluded driver conditions will be shown on your policy documents.
This excess applies for replacement of windscreen or window glass only. If your windscreen or window glass is repaired (and not replaced) no excess applies. No other additional excesses will apply.
This additional excess applies when the car is being driven by a person 26 years of age or over who has held a motor driver’s licence for less than 2 years.

Currently there are no active insurance policies to display.

Have an active policy and it’s not displayed? Please call us on 1300 657 627.
To make a claim, select the policy you want to make claim on, and select ‘Make a claim’.
We need more information about the modifications to your car before we can change your car.
RAC Policy and Claims Management - Car Modification call back
Please complete a call back request or call us on 1300 657 627.
Please complete a call back request or call us on 1300 657 627, quoting your policy number {0}.

We need more information about your new car before you can complete this transaction.
Please call us on 1300 657 627.

Your policy is due for renewal. If you want your cover to continue beyond your renewal date, you need to renew your policy by paying the premium. You can review and pay your renewal or vary your excess or agreed value by selecting ‘Renew my policy’. If you need to make any other changes to your policy, call us on 1300 657 627.

Your policy is due for renewal. If you wish to review your renewal, vary your excess or agreed value, select ‘Renew my policy’. Otherwise your policy will automatically renew using your current direct debit details. If you need to make any other changes to your policy, call us on 1300 657 627.
Your policy is currently in renewal and no further changes can be made online until {0}. If you need to make any other changes to your policy, call us on 1300 657 627.

Your certificate of currency is a document that confirms the currency of your insurance policy and provides a summary of the cover.

You can view and download your certificate of currency, or email it to an address of your choice. Simply choose the option that best suits your needs using the buttons below. The certificate can be downloaded as many times as necessary.

Should you have more than one financier please call 13 17 03

The requested document has been successfully sent to {0}.

If you do not receive an email within one hour, please check your spam folder.

There was a problem sending your email.

Please try again later or call RAC Insurance to obtain your document.
